recipe.name: Sausage Seasoning
recipe.notes: I'm a fan of fresh turkey sausage patties but finding ones that have any flavor in the store is a non-starter.  After several months of tinkering around trying to concoct my own recipe I cracked open Joy and found their seasoning to be mighty tasty with a little tinkering.  The trimmings from a normally butchered set of spareribs makes some truly excellent ground pork suitable for grilling with this recipe
recipe.preparation: Place ground meat in a large bowl.  Combine dry ingredients and integrate into meat, tossing with a fork to ensure even coverage before forming patties.
